Smell-O-Vision: Develop a technology that allows you to smell different foods and beverages through a special headset. This will allow you to experience the aroma of food and enjoy it as if you were eating it.
Taste-O-Meter: Invent a device that measures the taste of food using sensors. This device would allow you to taste different foods and beverages without actually eating them.

Taste-O-Map: Create a map that shows different types of food and their corresponding tastes. This map would allow you to visualize the different tastes and textures of food and enjoy them in your mind.
Taste-O-App: Develop an app that allows you to taste different foods and beverages through your phone. This app would use augmented reality to create a virtual taste experience.

Taste-O-Pod: Create a pod that allows you to taste different foods and beverages through a virtual reality headset. This pod would allow you to experience the taste and texture of food in a completely immersive way.
